actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the provision in the credit for energy conservation expenditures which limits the credit to dwelling units completed before April 20, 1977.
short_title: Residential Energy Credit Expansion Act of 1982

summary.text: Residential Energy Credit Expansion Act of 1982 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the income tax credit for residential energy conservation expenditures to residences constructed up until the date of enactment of this Act. (Present law limits the credit to residences constructed prior to April 20, 1977.)

titles.title: Residential Energy Credit Expansion Act of 1982
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the provision in the credit for energy conservation expenditures which limits the credit to dwelling units completed before April 20, 1977.
